Text: how does this work? do i just install it into the fsx folder if so that didnt work plus i tried to install it into the pss folder didnt work

Just run the installer if u have ur fsx folder set to the default. The font file will install to ur C:/Windows/fonts folder, if this is not ur default windows drive u need to find the font file, baloo.ttf file and place it in ur Windows/fonts folder
thx it works - but another problem lol whenever i turn on the ap the plane pitches up then pitches down. up down up down. any ideas???

yh i realize that the auto pilot does that, im going to be working on that and i will upload another fix for that. However u can fly the plane manually and practice base turns and so on until the fix is available.
ok cool - thanks for plane its awesome!
